ygData.subject: Re: Re: Flight spell
ygData.msgSnippet: i have created identify with the rune. on the scroll it s written for WIZ only, but a friend of mine (enchanter) was able to scribe it. She research levitate
ygData.messageBody:
i have created identify with the rune. on the scroll it's written for WIZ
only, but a friend of mine (enchanter) was able to scribe it. She research
levitate for me (enchanter only) and i could scribe it. To bad this doesn't
work with shop spells :)

Gydgith Lightweaver


>The Flight spell that your refering to from the Research book is actually
>levitate. You can pick it up at any druid guild.
>
>A note on Research. Whenever you make something with runes, no matter what
>the spell is, it will be a wizard only scroll that you produce. I
>researched Enstill as well as Identify, which are both used by other
>classes. But, the scroll I created was only memorizable by wizards.
